texts: How about this?
This is take it or leave it deal!
This means war!
Let's build trade alliance together!
Let's build alliance together!
Glad to make business with you!
I am sorry, I cannot accept this.
I'll take this as an insult!
This was your last insult! Die!
Good day! Let's get to know each others, $1.
Think carefully what you do next...
This meeting is something we both hate, but let's try it anyway!
Good day! I'll hope we can make business today.
Good day, friend! Let's sit down and talk a bit!
How about peace?
Hmm, childish insulting...
I am waiting your counter offer then.
Glad to make business with you!
Your fleet $1 has crossed my sector. Please move it away!
Sorry about the fleet. I'll call it back.
Sorry about this call. I thought you would have something to trade.
Let's make defensive pact together!
Your espionage fleet $1 has crossed my sector. Please move it away!
How about some intelligence trades for 20 star years?
How about trade embargo for 20 star years against $1?
Your fleet $1 has crossed our borders! This means war!
If you leave my fleet alone for 5 star years, I'll pay for it.
